name: Shinobi's Shadow
description:
This game is my final project of my school project.

Shinobi's Shadow is a 2D platformer stealh game, in which you play as a ninja chasing for revenge.

You play as Yoshiaki, a ninja, who is trying to discover the culpits of a tragic catastrophe.

After testing, i'd like to invite you to answer to a quick survey in order to give me some feedback about the game, so then I know what I should work on.

Thanks!
